text: Mens sana in corpore sano (a sound mind in a sound body).
author: Juvenal

text: A little sweat solves many stuck doors.
author: Anonymous

text: You rarely regret the workout you did.
author: Anonymous

text: Strength is built one honest rep at a time.
author: Anonymous

text: Motion moves mood.
author: Anonymous

text: Consistency beats intensity when intensity is inconsistent.
author: Anonymous

text: Train for the life you want to lift.
author: Anonymous

text: Your future self is cheering for this set.
author: Anonymous

text: Sweat is a letter your body writes to thank you.
author: Anonymous

text: Walk to solve problems; run to meet ideas.
author: Anonymous

text: Discipline warms up before motivation arrives.
author: Anonymous

text: Rest builds what training began.
author: Anonymous

text: Start cold, finish proud.
author: Anonymous

text: Make your plan easier than your excuse.
author: Anonymous

text: Show up for ten minutes; momentum will take it from there.
author: Anonymous

text: Hydrate like it’s part of the workout—because it is.
author: Anonymous

text: If it’s hard to start, make it smaller.
author: Anonymous

text: Train form first; speed later.
author: Anonymous

text: Sleep is tomorrow’s personal trainer.
author: Anonymous

text: Strong feels like freedom.
author: Anonymous
